title: ISic003448. Funerary inscription for Asklepiades
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἀσκλη-
πιάδη
χαῖρε

Apparatus criticus

Text of Cordano 2005

translation

Asklepiades, farewell!

commentary

The text implies the vocative + salutation formula which is found several times at Mineo, and reproduced in the latin epitaph engraved on the reverse of this stone (ISic003447). The text is said to come from Monte Catalfaro, c.3km NE of Mineo.

bibliography

  • Messina 1970 30 n.16 tav.11.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001439
  • Cordano 2005 121 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002668
  • Cordano 2014 107-108 no.6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001366
